sentences.sContent: She looked away so that Tom wouldn’t see her misery.
sentences.sCn: 她扭过头去，不让汤姆看到自己的痛苦。

sentences.sContent: His face was a picture of sheer misery (= great unhappiness, with no other emotion ) .
The news plunged him into abject misery (= extreme unhappiness ) .
sentences.sCn: 这消息让他陷入极度痛苦之中。

synos.tran: 痛苦，悲惨；不幸；苦恼；穷困
